ygData.subject: RE: Item Info Requests
ygData.msgSnippet: DOH! My bad on the spoiler! Tis what happens you haven t camped them mobbies! Sorry about that! ... From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@artesianet.com]
ygData.messageBody:
DOH! My bad on the spoiler! Tis what happens you haven't camped them
mobbies! Sorry about that!

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:16 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Item Info Requests


From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>

Man-o-war is paladin only. no clue on mob drop.
Spiritist hammer. Yep. Fearplane.
Blue 2hander. Quest. Unsure of the details. Only a few are in the game
and they were handed down from GM's

Spoiler corrections....

The Alchemist drops the mammoth legs as common and cloak as rare.
The Archeologist drops the Archeologist pack as common and the dented brass
mask as rare
